General.Name: CU Tech Corp.
General.Description: CU-Tech Corporation develops, manufactures, and sells components on PCB/FPC boards in South Korea. It offers surface mount technology A'ssy for mobile display; FPCA and touch sensor panel FPCA for smart phone display; PBA for tablet display; and TSP for foldable phone display. The company was founded in 2004 and is based in Pyeongtaek, South Korea.
